# [Interview #897: Twitter 2013 (Non-WoT), Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=897#21)

#### [Mike Cockrum (23 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/lamguin/status/294192166115360769)

How many shards has Hoid received powers from, whether taken, stolen, given, etc.?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/294210314591952896)

Well, he has a bead of Lerasium.
